title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 301.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 301.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) These regulations are
promulgated pursuant to General Business Law ("GBL") article 32, as added by Chapter 532 of the Laws of 1993. They set forth the procedures for the
operation of an alternative arbitration mechanism (the "program") as required by GBL section 670(4). (b) These regulations are designed to promote the independent, speedy, efficient and fair disposition of disputes concerning defective motorized
wheelchairs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
301.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
